罦字的基本解释

罦
fú
一种捕鸟的网，鸟入网后，能自动将鸟罩住：“雉离于罦。”
覆盖：“湿迎床足，罦于墙屋。”

罦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》芳無切，平虞，敷。］
［《廣韻》縛謀切，平尤，並。］
(1)装设机关掩捕鸟兽的网。又称覆车网。
(2)覆盖。

罦字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【网字部】　罦； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页948第02
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?芳無切，音敷。【爾雅·釋器】罬謂之罦。罦，覆車也。【註】今之翻車也。有兩轅，中施罥以捕鳥，輾轉相解。【詩·王風】雉離于罦。【傳】覆車也。　又【廣韻】縛謀切【集韻】【韻會】房尤切【正韻】房鳩切，?音浮。【集韻】或从包从不。

罦字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
罦字的起名意思

暂无。

net for catching birds
Basic explanation of words
net for catching birds
fú
A net for catching birds. After the bird enters the net, it can automatically cover the bird: "The pheasant is away from the scramble."
Covering: "Wet the foot of the bed, scribbled in the wall house."
net for catching birds
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fú］
["Guangyun" Fang Wuqie, Pingyu, Fu. ]
["Guangyun" Bin Mouqie, Ping You, and. ]
(1) Install nets for agencies to cover birds and beasts. Also known as Fuchewang.
(2) Covering.
net for catching birds
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not Centralized] [Web Character Department] 　罦; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 948 No. 02
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Fang Wuqi, sound compression. 【Erya·Release Device】The 罬 is called the 罦. Scribble, cover the car too. [Note] This is also a rollover. There are two shafts, Zhong Shi Yu used to catch birds, tossing around each other. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】The pheasant is separated from Yu Jian. [Biography] Covering the car too.　[Guangyun] Bin Mouqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Fang Youqie [Zheng Yun] Fang Jiuqie, sound floating. [Ji Yun] Or Cong Bao never.
